subtitle: Dwelling in Adventurer's Path
description: A strange creature that loves eating strawberries
It has tough skin and absurd defense, but since
it’s so focused on strawberries,
it lacks much urge to attack. Because of that,
passing adventurers often end up feeding it…
1: ASABA looks at me with anticipation—
Did it smell something on me...?
2: Did it smell something on me...?
3: ASABA looks at me with disgust—
6: ASABA finished the food with a blank look—
7: ASABA seems very pleased with the strawberry—
Granted a strange blessing by ASABA!
8: ASABA looks at me with disgust—
Was it that bad...? The food just now...
11: now ASABA holds a grudge against me…

description: A fish shadow swimming underwater that quickly
flees when it senses someone approaching.
What could be the right way to catch them...?
A cat eared girl from a small village,
looking both cute and energetic.
The katana at her waist hints that
she is far from ordinary.
She travels around seeking duels with
strong opponents, though her flashy behavior
always makes one worry she might attract
some shady adults...
1: I’m just here to challenge myself. I’m not really
interested in the truth of the Grand Labyrinth.
2: Are you also a fan of yuusha-sama!?
3: A wooden sword of such high quality
5: Would you like to spar with me?
I really want to see how we measure up as rivals.
9: But if you ever become interested,
I’ll be happy to fight you anytime.
10: My ambition is to become a Sword Saint!
12: Ahh... you seem to be alright.
13: for proposing such a duel earlier!
14: It seems I may have gone
15: Since it’s a duel, I’ll give it
it my all without holding back.
17: Needless to say, I won’t refuse your challenge!
21: Dragging you into such an unreasonable duel
without offering any reward feels wrong...
22: Please take this—it's a skill I developed myself.
I’m sure it’ll be useful to you!
23: It might sound a bit boastful,
but I’m already the strongest in my village.
24: Still, thanks to you, I’ve learned that
there’s always someone stronger out there.
25: Time to train harder with my sword!!

description: A knight clad in armor that radiates an ominous
aura. Because the helmet is tightly sealed,
their voice is muffled, making it impossible to
determine their gender or age.
they claims to be a game developer and,
in search of creative inspiration,
asks adventurers about their journeys
and offers material support in return.
Also, they seems to know the Abyss well—
1: in pursuit of the Grand Labyrinth?
2: You may have heard of me—
I am but a humble game developer by trade.
3: Drawn in by this Grand Labyrinth,
I wished to share its mysterious allure with the world.
4: Yet, I must admit with some shame that I am no warrior,
and can only express this passion through creation.
6: than a personal hobby of mine!
7: By donning such equipment like this,
I can at least feel somewhat like an adventurer.
8: In fact, I can barely move under its weight…
10: So many heroes and legends gather in this place,
and I must continue gathering inspiration and materials.
11: That being said, if you don’t mind,
would you be willing to try my humble work?
12: I’m certain it will be of help
13: …What!? You don’t know who I am,
and lack a device capable of running games!?
14: Fear not! To prepare for such situations,
I always carry missionary tools with me!
15: Our meeting here is a kind of fate,
so I shall offer the device at cost price!
16: I also happen to run a small shop——
17: Naturally, this is also because I must
18: So if you find yourself interested,
I would greatly appreciate your patronage!
19: Hahaha, then the pact is sealed.
I await your thoughts after you have played.
20: And should you be willing to share your tales,
they may yet inspire my future creations.
32: have you found any interest in
taking part in my great undertaking?
33: taken anything away from my game?
34: So you seek an antidote for your family—
35: I must confess my own inadequacy.
Of the alchemical secret known as Elixir Rubrum,
36: At your present level of arms and equipment,
The descent into the Abyss will not be an easy trial.
37: I advise you to prepare more supplies,
Or to take time and study the true nature of your weapons.
38: Many alchemical remnants from bygone eras
you may yet uncover their true purpose.
39: I too collect items of practical use.
Should you wish, I would welcome your patronage.
40: Among monsters dwell intelligent races, versed in human speech,
Some of whom bear no ill will toward mankind.
41: Should you encounter them on your journey,
you may even trade for valuable information.
43: There is no need to hurry.
44: Then the price shall be \c[6]\v[85]\c[0] yen.
45: For a fellow kindred, \c[6]\v[85]\c[0] yen will suffice.
48: serve you well when it matters most.
49: Even among adventurers, all trades require fair terms.
50: Return when your purse is better prepared.
51: That is all I can offer for today.
52: That these items found their way to you is satisfaction enough.
53: To find it at my feet… how curious.
57: Oh! To receive praise from your family—
it truly is a great honor for me.
58: With that, I feel even more
59: That said, it seems I still haven’t
61: …Is there really something in my game
that would inspire such an impression?
62: Oh no. I got too absorbed in that
63: Shared information that the mushrooms growing on
walking mushrooms are actually quite tasty.
64: Monster cuisine, you say! What a novel idea!
65: Shared information that the strange birds in the dungeon
66: A juvenile Garuda, perhaps… I wonder which would be
more overwhelming compared to the legendary dragon roar.
68: Shared information about a hidden passage in the Labyrinth
that connects to the outside world.
69: It looks like a passage left behind by a previous engineering team.
I heard they once planned to excavate the entire Labyrinth.
70: However, the project suddenly stalled halfway through.
No one knows what kind of trouble they ran into.
71: Shared information about a strange mushroom house
at the end of the forest where people get lost.
72: I’ve heard many adventurers lose their way inside…
but as expected of you, you managed to make it through safely.
73: As for that enormous mushroom house…
it certainly makes one curious what kind of creature lives within.
74: falling into a pit inside the dungeon.
75: Hahaha…! That truly is an embarrassing experience.
As an adventurer, one must always be aware of their surroundings.
76: Shared information about discovering a mech
77: I see… what a remarkable encounter. As expected,
the Great Labyrinth still hides traces of ancient civilizations.
78: I have no reason to doubt your account.
79: This must be a matter of fate.
Someday, it will surely appear once again.
80: Shared information that jelly made from slimes
surprisingly has quite a good texture.
82: During these days, you’ve given me
quite a lot of interesting inspiration.
If I didn’t offer at least a small token of thanks,
83: This is an outfit I personally designed
Please accept it as a gift that

description: It seems to be a machine operated and
managed by the Maid Bunny.
It’s not entirely clear why monsters would want
to imitate humans and run a business,
but everyone has naturally come to accept it.
By the way, carrot milk has the worst reviews.
4: a temporary repair penalty has been added..."
Until the penalty is fully paid...

subtitle: Demonic Sister of The Fallen Church

description: There seems to be something under the water...
A high-rank monster evolved from the
Horned Rabbit. For monster, horns serve both
as weapons and as cores for storing mana.
Unlike the Horned Rabbit, it’s highly aggressive
When excited, its body turns red as mana surges,
and it launches rapid, repeated charges.
A being so infamous that even its name
became taboo. In theory, it’s almost harmless—
but its terrifying appearance and unpredictable
movements are enough to throw everyone
present into chaos.
A long-neglected stone monument,
now cracked and weathered.
You can tell it was once exquisitely carved.
Even after all these years, it still
carries an aura that inspires quiet awe.
A strange girl always dressed as a maid with rabbit ears.
Possesses the ability to teleport,
appearing from all sorts of strange holes.
Frequently teases adventurers but is mostly harmless.
1: Why are you so ugly usa…?
2: you have the scent of carrots, usa…

description: A gacha machine summoned by a Tarot card.
It eats up whatever adventurers offer it.
When satisfied, it happily spins and
finally spits out a reward-filled capsule.
But be careful not to overfeed it—though it's
a machine, it seems to get food poisoning...
2: I found a weird gacha machine...
4: But I don’t have enough money to feed it…

description: A mobile shop run by two catgirls.
They show up flashily when adventurers call.
Goods are mostly Abyss junk they found.
Watch out, prices can be a total ripoff.
Look down on them, and get beaten up...
PS:\c[2]Blacklisted by the Maid Bunnies
\c[2]for stealing customers.
1: Hi~! Welcome, nya♪ Take your time looking around,
and feel free to ask me anything, nya!

description: A strange monster often found in jungles,
much larger than regular mushrooms.
It can freely walk on its legs and is aggressive.
However, it's delicious, making it a favorite
target for adventurers and chefs alike.
A passable door summoned by the Star Tarot.
The stars are believed to guide one back home.
Passing through this door returns the traveler
to a safe area. Adventurers often use it
to return to a place of rest, or to retreat
temporarily when the situation turns unfavorable.
A young orc still in its growth phase,
already about the size of a human.
It reacts to living beings and greedily
absorbs their life force.
A corpse reanimated through necromancy.
It still retains aggression and possesses
considerable combat ability.
A massive avian beast.
It charges at adventurers with its large body,
and also uses sonic attacks, so beware.
A slime that mutated after mistakenly
eating an adorable kitty,
and became cute itself as a result.
It has lost its will to attack,
but will puff up like a cat when threatened...
A slime that mutated after mistakenly
eating an adorable kitty,
and became cute itself as a result.
It has lost its will to attack,
but will puff up like a cat when threatened...
A slime that mutated after mistakenly
eating an adorable kitty,
and became cute itself as a result.
It has lost its will to attack,
but will puff up like a cat when threatened...
A slime that mutated after mistakenly
eating an adorable kitty,
and became cute itself as a result.
It has lost its will to attack,
but will puff up like a cat when threatened...
A creature…? shaped like a banana.
A fairy born from the influence of the Abyssal
aura, It poses little threat to adventurers.
However, there are rumors it can
easily send people flying…
A creature…? shaped like an apple.
A fairy born from the influence of the Abyssal
aura, It poses little threat to adventurers.
However, there are rumors it can
easily send people flying…
The severed limb of a dead mage.
No one knows what its original owner went through,
But infused with necromancy, this hand stays active.
Adventurers often see it make obvious gestures
when attacking.
An alchemical elemental creature composed of
water that wields elemental magic.
It has high resistance to physical attacks,
but cannot survive in environments without water.
A stray cat possessed by demonic power.
It gained the ability to fly along with
dark magical powers. But in the end,
it’s still just a cat—
At most, it just shoots small magic blasts.
A magical creature born from a dead soul’s grudge
through necromancy. It endlessly roams graveyards
and has high resistance to physical attacks,
and can spit out deadly ghost fire.
A common monster found in the outskirts of
the Abyss. It evolved a green color due to its
habit of feeding on plants. When approached
suddenly, it becomes agitated,and starts
spraying corrosive slime.
A slime that accidentally consumed a Jack Bomb.
Though it didn’t explode right away,
it remains extremely unstable, and becomes
agitated and self-destructive when provoked.
A mutated slime influenced by the environment
of a graveyard. It aggressively attacks adventurers
like a zombie, becoming more vicious,
and the deathly aura surrounding.
its body can infect others on contact,
causing instant death if you're not careful...
A slime mutated after absorbing magic from
an unknown source. It thrives in watery areas
and creates thick armor of ice using its magic.
It absorbs large amounts of water,
rapidly cools it, and blasts it at adventurers.
A sparkling slime that can discharge electricity
all over its body. Even slimes don’t know what it
ate to mutate like this. But in its current state of
freely discharging electricity, getting close is dangerous...
A slime that consumed magic-infused crystals,
hardening its body. Tough minerals grow on its
surface, forming deadly weapons.
While tougher, it’s still a slime at heart.
Also, the ore it drops seems to be quite valuable…
A grotesque creature born from an egg.
Its malformed, unnatural growth environment
has twisted its body into a mass of tangled tissues.
It possesses a fierce urge to attack,
driven by the desire to devour flesh and be reborn.
Even in the deadly Abyss, littering isn’t cool.
Still, Whatever you toss vanishes by next day...
Feels like someone’s cleaning up.
But be careful—don’t toss in flammable stuff.
Treat it too rough,
and you might trigger something nasty.
4: I’ll have to toss everything at once...)

description: Wait, do peppers grow on trees?
Although \str[120] really hates it,
I, as an adventurer,
can’t afford to be picky with food.
Easy to mistake for weeds
if you do not look closely.
Dig beneath the soil and you will find
tasty potatoes.
Tomatoes brimming with juice and
a gentle fragrance,
as if someone had raised them with great care...
A fruit tree laden with strawberries
that looks absolutely delicious.
It often attracts a certain creature to come
and steal a bite.
"I'm just a scarecrow.
Since I don't have a heart,
I can't feel pain."
A wild rabbit mutated by magical contamination—
the horn on its head is the mark of this change.
However, it’s still in its growth stage
and not particularly dangerous.
Also, its meat remains tender and delicious.
A slime engulfed in blazing flames—
just getting close to it radiates intense heat.
Normal attacks are nearly useless against it,
and adventurers can only be thankful
that this kind of monster only appears in
extreme environments like lava fields.
A mere shadow of the
Death Devil's will—
no mortal survives its price.
Even this echo brings death
to all it sees,
summoner included.

sentouryoku: \c[10]It's rude to ask a girl's stats~♥
description: Looks like a harmless little girl,
but is actually a free-spirited Archdemon.
Friendly toward humans, but loves teasing them
and savoring their flustered reactions.
She runs a shop out of whim,
with items and prices changing on a whim as well.
Basically, she just wants to get her favorite salmon
from humans however she can...
1: Oh my~ What a rare guest~ Hehe~
I’ve got some good stuff here, take your time♥
2: Yaho~! What a coincidence~ So nice to see you again~!
Is it fate~? Or maybe you're just super lucky~?
3: Hehe, either way~! When luck’s on your side,
you better watch out—someone might just snatch it away♥
4: My shop’s a special one, you know~
I sell things you won’t find anywhere else~
5: Mhm~ What’s up? Your face is all red~ \w[45]Hehe~ \w[45]
Did I charm you or something? You’re just too cute~
7: You’re into this kind of thing, huh?
9: Oh~ wanna know more about me?
Fair enough~ I haven’t introduced myself, have I~
10: Well then, I’m~ The Archdemon from
the depths of the Abyss! Aki~!
11: Hey now! Don’t give me that scary face~
I’m just here to make a little trade today~!
14: You’ll give it to me, won’t you♥
15: (Ah, so it was the salmon in my bag
16: Mhm mhm~! This is exactly what I wanted!
I’ll make sure to thank you properly♥
17: Please~ Even just a little bit is fine…
Share it with me? Pretty please♥
18: this brat really wants some salmon…)
20: Are you trying to defy Lady Aki?
21: Tsk tsk~ Such a naughty boy~!
Guess I’ll have to punish you properly♥
22: \>\c[10]《Demonic Contract Ritual: Purehearted Human’s Absolute Curse =
\>From Today, Your Life Is Hell Mode》!!     \w[90]
24: So much salmon for me♥ You're too sweet, onii-san~
Trying to win my heart, huh~?
25: So cute♥ I just can’t resist~
26: Take this little cutie with you~
If you want to find me, just send it with a message~♥
27: You want to buy this item?
Sure~ I’ll sell it to you~!
28: Ah! But you know, I don’t really care about money~
For a demon like me, that stuff’s totally worthless~
29: Hmm, you’ve got some decent muscles there,
So I’m sure you can manage~!
30: Then trade it for some salmon~!
31: There’s water all over the place nearby, right?
Shouldn’t be that hard for you to catch a few fish~?
32: If you thought that was the end, you’re soooo wrong~♥
Unless you properly reflect, I’m never letting you off the hook!
33: It’s gonna stick around for a while~♥
34: Bet this is super annoying for you, onii-san♥
35: Aww~ Wanna beg me to lift the curse~?
36: And what if I say no~? What’ll you do~?
Aww, don’t make that face~ That’s not gonna work on me~
37: Now I just wanna bully you more, onii-san♥
No curse lifting for you~ Ahaha♥
38: Wow, you’re really desperate, huh? Such a ZAKO♥
Show me you’re sorry with more sincerity~♥
39: I guess I really do have to offer her some fish…)
41: So much salmon for me♥ sluuurp♥
42: Alrighty~! The curse is lifted now~!
Hope we can play again soon, onii-san♥
43: Well well~ Long time no see, onii-san~
You showed up at just the right time~♥
44: Wanna try out a brand-new item?
It's a Mizumanju I made myself~
45: It makes your body extra sensitive♥
46: And it doesn't just work on humans~
It’s super effective on monsters too!
47: So, what do you think? Just ten salmon~?
Wanna buy it? No? Hurry up and decide♥
49: Seriously, ZAKO onii-san, even your brain turned to ZAKO~?
Can’t even cough up a few fish… so useless♥
50: No money, no salmon—what a weak, pathetic onii-san~
No wonder you're single and still a virgin~
51: If you change your mind someday, come back and buy it~
Not that I care or anything♥
52: Can’t believe you passed on something this amazing♥
53: Now I can go eat sooo much salmon again~
54: Can’t believe you passed on something this amazing♥
55: Ah~ I mean, probably nothing will happen♥
But onii-san, you do look suuuper weak~
56: So I figured I better warn you~
This, you know, you can use it on yourself too~
57: And yeah, the effect is making your body suuuper sensitive♥
So like, definitely don’t try it on yourself, okay~?
58: Or wait, you actually want to use it?
onii-san’s totally a hopeless little masochist, huh♥
59: come visit me again next time, okay~♥
60: Too bad~ It's already sold out~?
Geez, onii-san, you really are that desperate, huh♥
61: If you want more, you’ll have to wait till next time~
Buuut if you bring me salmon, I might make an exception♥
62: Oh my♥ You want more? So greedy~!
Buying this much... are you planning something naughty~?
63: you should’ve brought this out way earlier~
64: Just give me one and I’ll sell it to you~♥

description: A candy machine filled with all sorts of
colorful sweets. All of them are handmade konpeitō
by the shop owner.
It seems to be made with some special ingredients,
giving off a strange but pleasant aroma…
But even if you ask out of curiosity what’s inside,
All you’ll get is a meaningful smile from the girl...
4: \str[120] might like these kinds of snacks...
What should I do? Should I give it a try?
5: What should I do? Should I give it a try?
8: Just offer a bit more salmon then...
